# mem0

**Type:** AI Memory Management Platform  
**Status:** Research Phase  
**Potential Use:** Freddie Mac Implementation  
**Website:** https://mem0.ai/

## Overview

**Purpose:** AI memory management and knowledge retention platform  
**Key Features:** 
- Persistent memory for AI systems
- Knowledge base management
- Context retention across conversations
- Enterprise-grade memory solutions
